title: For $16, you can be done with ads forever
content:
Macworld

Have you noticed that you’re getting an influx of ads while watching YouTube or reading online?  If you’re tired of wasting time waiting for or clicking out of ads, you can banish them for good, all while protecting your devices and information, with the AdGuard Family Plan. It lets you secure up to nine devices for life for only $15.97 (reg. $79) through January 12.

This plan is ideal for families or anyone with multiple Apple (or Android) devices. Keep your iPhone, your kids’ iPads, and other tech free of distracting banners, intrusive pop-ups, and irritating video ads—AdGuard is designed to block all types of ads.

AdGuard also simultaneously hides your online activity from malicious trackers and analyzers. It additionally protects users from malvertising, a common cyberattack where advertisements on legitimate websites will link out to harmful destinations that might contain malware or phishing attempts. 

If you have kids who are online more than you are, AdGuard offers handy parental controls. You can ensure your kids can only watch, read, or listen to child-friendly content.

Once you pay the one-time fee, this plan is yours for life. You’ll get complete access to this ad blocker, regular updates, and the latest features as you use AdGuard.

Ditch the ads for good when you get lifetime access to AdGuard’s Family Plan for just $15.97 until January 12 at 11:59 p.m. PT.
